channel.title: Add a mini-game to the loading screens
channel.description:
Namco's patent on loading screen minigames has expired.
Do it.

item.title: Add a mini-game to the loading screens
item.dc:creator: dky.tehkingd.u
item.description:
Just put Half-Life 1 in the loading screens so you can play Half-Life in Half-Life while you wait for Half-Life to load, which itself would be required to load Half-Life in Half-Life while loading Half-Life.

Read full topic
item.source: Add a mini-game to the loading screens

item.description:

item.source: Add a mini-game to the loading screens

item.title: Add a mini-game to the loading screens
item.dc:creator: Dustin
item.description:
Maxey:

Since the loadings are so short, make it Warioware style where you have 5 seconds to do something.

The loading screens are pretty short, but it usually (at least for me) takes more than a mere five seconds! Still, it would have to be short nonetheless.

Read full topic
item.source: Add a mini-game to the loading screens

item.title: Add a mini-game to the loading screens
item.dc:creator: _rot_fodder
item.description:
Walk into elevator

2d flash headcrab jumps on face set to midi fanfare

10/10 would shit pants again

item.title: Add a mini-game to the loading screens
item.dc:creator: ArcHammer
item.description:
Admiral Sakai:

How about one where you play a member of the BMPD team, wandering through Black Mesa cleaning up blood spatters and replacing blown-out light bulbs.

#BMPDlife
